review_data.title: Nice neighbourhood place
review_data.content: Very nice little place for brunch on the weekend. Came here with my boyfreind and had omelettes. Price is super fair. We'll be back again.

review_data.title: Great Omelette and Nice Earl Grey
review_data.content: Happened to come here today with a friend, after 18 months not visiting. We enjoyed our brunch here, and the food was good and service was lovely. Happy to have visited again!!

review_data.title: good food

review_data.title: Galette in Zürich

review_data.title: Brunchplace

review_data.title: Never a doubt to visit here.

review_data.title: Small-town flair in the city
review_data.content: Cosy place in a quiet corner of town; the staff is really friendly. Their home-made cooking makes you feel like you're invited to a friend's living room. Their chocolate cake is a must-try!

review_data.title: Delicious Crepes!
review_data.content: Me and my sister had different, but equally delicious crepes! We also enjoyed the peaceful and cozy atmosphere and the friendly service. Recommended if you're looking for some French flair and/or some Crêpes salées!
